name: 3. Classic Tech
description: Professional tech design with IBM Plex Sans and Serif fonts
instructions: Maintain a professional, corporate tech aesthetic using the IBM Plex font family. Use IBM blue (#0F62FE) as the primary accent and red (#DA1E28) for warnings or critical emphasis. Keep designs structured and trustworthy.

image_style.prompt: Create professional, technical images with clean diagrams and structured layouts. Use IBM blue (#0F62FE) as the primary color with red (#DA1E28) for emphasis on white backgrounds. Style should feel corporate, trustworthy, and technical.
